title._content: Panoramic view of the Little Wonder Coal Mine

description._content: caption on back "Dickie Mills Coal Mine circa 1908 -1923 People are unidentified Proper name of the mine owner was Johathon James Mills. For more information about the Gibson and Little Wonder Coal Mines, see ERCB Coal Mine Atlas: Operating and Abandoned Coal Mines in Alberta, second edition (Calgary, 1988), available in the Archives. To obtain high quality and larger reproductions of this image please visit the Galt Museum & Archives website: www.galtmuseum.com/archives.htm and include thIs number in your request: P19881042015
